articles.description: More than 36,000 people have now died in hospitals across the UK after developing the virus
articles.content:
More than 36,000 people have died from coronavirus across the UK, figures show.
The total coronavirus death toll in the UK has risen by 338 to 36,042.
Another 2,615 positive Covid-19 cases have been confirmed, taking the total number in the UK to 250,908
